forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, then cloudy in the afternoon. Thunder possible. High 14C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers this morning with overcast skies during the afternoon hours. Thunder possible. High 59F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies this evening will become overcast overnight. Slight chance of a shower throughout the evening. Low near 10C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to cloudy skies late. Slight chance of a shower throughout the evening. Low 51F. Winds light and variable.
